Property.name: util_path
Property.Description: Specify the path of TF.exe utility file.

Property.name: working_dir
Property.Description: Specify the working directory on local.

Property.name: item
Property.Description: Specify Artifact ID. Wildcard (*) is also supported.

Property.name: version
Property.Description:
Optional version specification. You can specify a version by: Date/time (D10/20/2005), Changeset version (C1256), Label (Lmylabel), Latest version (T), Workspace version (Wworkspacename;owner)
If no version is provided, Team Foundation Server retrieves the latest server version

Property.name: included_files
Property.Description: Set of comma separated include patterns using ANT matching rule. Example: **/*.war,**/*.zip will get all .war and .zip files recursively

Property.name: excluded_files
Property.Description: Set of comma separated exclude patterns using ANT matching rule. Example: **/*.txt will exclude all .txt files recursively
